archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Joseph Simmons Musgrave, Sr., Photographs n.d.
did.abstract: The collection contains two copies of a photograph depicting the home of Joseph Simmons Musgrave, Sr., in Southampton County, Virginia.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Joseph Simmons Musgrave, Sr., Photographs must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Joseph Simmons Musgrave, Sr., Photographs, Ms1965-001, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Joseph Simmons Musgrave, Sr., Photographs were donated to Special Collections in 1965.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Joseph Simmons Musgrave, Jr., Photographs commenced and was completed in 1965. Additional description was completed in June 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Joseph Simmons Musgrave, Sr., was born in December 1863. He graduated from VAMC in 1883. In 1886, he married Lalla Pope. They had five sons. Musgrave, Sr., died in 1949.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains two copies of a photograph depicting the home of Joseph Simmons Musgrave, Sr., in Southampton County, Virginia.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged type of material.
